Key Match Events: Dani Olmo gave Spain the lead in the 51st minute
Florian Wirtz scored the equalizer at the death
Mikel Merino scored the winning goal in the 119th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Julian Nagelsmann should have stuck to the basics and not overcomplicated his lineup selection
Germany finally has a base to build on and a manager with a strong vision in Julian Nagelsmann
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game recorded the highest number of fouls in a game this tournament
The referee failed to award penalties in two clear instances
Joshua Kimmich had a masterclass performance on the right flank
Toni Kroos played his last game as a footballer
